atlantic.title: America's First Openly Bisexual Governor
atlantic.topComment: Best of luck to Gov. Brown in her new role. It is my hope that the day will come when sexual orientation is no longer an issue for public office holders.

atlantic.title: The Robot That Knows When to Swipe Right
atlantic.topComment: Seeing as how most American women are a giant pain in the ass, is it possible to date the robot?
